name: SetUp
_source: # More dialogue here could definitely be good
s;Anuki;Alright, Bordeaux, you ready to lose?
s;Simon;Have you started training yet?{w}{br}Lord Morrissey asked if I'd join.
s;Bordeaux;Ah, you must be Lord Verstadt.{w}{br}By all means, feel free to join Anuki.
s;Bordeaux;She needs all the help she can get!
s;Anuki;Yeah, yeah.{w}{br}You always bring your troops anyway, so this'll make it even.
s;Bordeaux;Oh, Lord Verstadt.{w}{br}Let's make this interesting, shall we?
s;Bordeaux;If you and Lady Anuki can win, and do so quickly,{w}{br}I'll make it worth your while.{w}{br}Just don't expect this to be easy!

speak;Narrator;Bordeaux is a <icon>Ruler</> Ruler, granting him enhanced battlefield capabilities.{w}{br}He will gain an additional action whenever one of your units ends their turn.{w}{br}However, if broken, he will not be able to move until his next turn.;StyleNid=hint
speak;Luther;Tread carefully, this is much more than a training bout.
speak;Luther;Lord Morrissey intends this as a test.
speak;Luther;Our performance here will determine the nature of our relationship.
speak;Simon;Why? Wasn't surviving the siege proof enough?
speak;Simon;I suppose our goal is the same.
speak;Simon;Defeating his captain should "prove" our capability.
speak;Narrator;If you can defeat Bordeaux in 6 turns or fewer, you may receive an extra reward.;StyleNid=hint
